      Classes in lumis.portal.serialization that implement ITransactionObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileCopyTransactionObserver
      Implementation of ITransactionObserver that performs a file copy operation that can be rolled back.

    • Uses of ITransactionObserver in lumis.portal.transaction

      Classes in lumis.portal.transaction that implement ITransactionObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTransactionObserver
      Implementation of ITransactionObserver that does not affect the outrun of a transaction.

    • Uses of ITransactionObserver in lumis.socialnetworkintegration.action

      Classes in lumis.socialnetworkintegration.action that implement ITransactionObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  AbstractMessageAction.AfterRollbackSetErrorStatus
      Class that will set the SocialNetworkMessage to SocialNetworkMessageStatus.Error after the rollback has occurred.

    • Uses of ITransactionObserver in lumis.util
